channel.title: Creating a NPC + Shop
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I've recently been trying to add a shop. However it doesn't seem to work, looked up some tutorials however its not quite working so I was wondering if you guys knew what I'm doing wrong or forgetting.
I've added the NPC in the "npc" file I've added it into the "spawn-config" file I've added it into the "shops" file (however I'm not 100% sure how to do that so if yo guys can tell me would be awesome) and I've added it at the "ActionHandler.java" right underneath the 541 from Zeke. However when I compile it and log on the NPC shows up but when I click it doesn't show a shop.
Any suggestions?
Thanks,
Unique

item.title: Creating a NPC + Shop
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Post all code snippets of what you have done so far so we can look at it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @lilman09 lilman09
item.description:
@lilman09 wrote:

umm try copying a shop that works on your server, sometimes other ones work besides that i dont really know

(in shops.cfg copy a shop that works)

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a NPC + Shop

item.description:
